input.description: Check SSL configuration in enabled sites

content.text: Configuration syntax is OK and nginx is running. No SSL configuration found in enabled sites - you may need to configure SSL certificates if required.

message.content:
# Configurar SSL para moonyetis.io
  certbot --nginx -d moonyetis.io -d www.moonyetis.io

  # Verificar que el dominio apunte correctamente
  nslookup moonyetis.io

  # Después del SSL, reiniciar nginx
  systemctl reload nginx

  # Verificar configuración SSL
  nginx -t && systemctl status nginx

content.text: I'll help you configure SSL for moonyetis.io. Let me run these commands step by step.

todos.content: Configure SSL certificate for moonyetis.io and www.moonyetis.io using certbot
Reload nginx service after SSL configuration
